overview.default_summary: System is aggregating real-time indicators to determine current market risk posture.

summary.risk_on_aggressive_yield_curve: Market conditions are highly favorable. Yield curve is healthy, supporting aggressive growth strategies.
summary.risk_on_aggressive_vix: Volatility is extremely low. Market sentiment supports risk-on positioning.
summary.risk_on_aggressive_buffett_indicator: Valuations are reasonable. Consider increasing equity exposure.
summary.risk_on_aggressive_sp_500_momentum: Strong upward momentum confirmed. Trend-following strategies are effective.
summary.risk_on_aggressive_default: All indicators point to favorable conditions. Aggressive positioning recommended.
summary.risk_on_medium_yield_curve: Yield curve is normalizing. Moderate risk appetite is appropriate.
summary.risk_on_medium_vix: Volatility is contained. Balanced portfolio approach is sensible.
summary.risk_on_medium_buffett_indicator: Valuations are elevated but not extreme. Selective opportunities exist.
summary.risk_on_medium_sp_500_momentum: Momentum is positive but slowing. Stay invested with caution.
summary.risk_on_medium_default: Market conditions are stable. Maintain diversified allocation.
summary.caution_yield_curve: Yield curve is flattening. Prepare for potential market shift.
summary.caution_vix: Volatility is rising. Consider reducing risk exposure.
summary.caution_buffett_indicator: Valuations are stretched. Be selective with new investments.
summary.caution_sp_500_momentum: Momentum is weakening. Watch for trend reversals.
summary.caution_default: Mixed signals detected. Hedging strategies may be prudent.
summary.risk_off_yield_curve: Yield curve inversion detected. Recession risk is elevated.
summary.risk_off_vix: High volatility indicates market stress. Defensive positioning advised.
summary.risk_off_buffett_indicator: Extreme overvaluation detected. Capital preservation is priority.
summary.risk_off_sp_500_momentum: Price is below 200-day average. Bear market conditions possible.
summary.risk_off_default: Multiple risk indicators are elevated. Shift to defensive assets.
